pgrid.network.protocol
Interface PGridMessage

All Superinterfaces:
Message
All Known Implementing Classes:
ACKMessage, BootstrapMessage, BootstrapReplyMessage, ChallengeMessage, ChallengeReplyMessage, DataModifierMessage, ExchangeInvitationMessage, ExchangeMessage, ExchangeReplyMessage, GenericMessage, InitMessage, InitResponseMessage, MessageHeader, PeerLookupMessage, PeerLookupReplyMessage, QueryMessage, QueryReplyMessage, RangeQueryMessage, ReplicateMessage, SearchPathMessage, SearchPathReplyMessage
public interface PGridMessage
extends Message

This class represents a interface for all Gridella messages.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt
